column5: Here a pic of the 29.4 pound King that steelhedrmatt and I caught that snag us a 1000 big ones. Was a bit of tough decision whether to weigh it in the tourney as we both held derby tickets and can't be weighed for both but thought better about maybe watching it slip down the board. If it was 1 pound bigger it would of been even tougher decision.It was caught with a rac spoon 70ft over 140 ft in front of the Pickering nuke station. Fun day in the waves and the sun. Was nice to see the proceeds from his tourney benefiting the ringwood hatchery.
WOW.... that is a big fish  Great job and great report!!  Thansk for sharing Leechman
Nice fish iceguy you made the right choice to weigh it in the Whitby tourney i need one like that this weekend  Rob
Congrats guys !!!!!   well done,nice size king too !!!...cheers
You need to get out of those winter cloths in yer Avatar bro.LOL Good luck to you getting one like that.
~~~~Well done Bud, great report, lets hope you don't do as well next Perch Tourney
